scripts.docker-run: ssh crew@starship 'docker stop kiosk ||:&& docker rm kiosk ||:&& docker run -d --privileged -v /tmp/.X11-unix:/tmp/.X11-unix -e DISPLAY=:0 --device /dev/snd -v /dev/shm:/dev/shm --net=host --name kiosk toomanycaptains/kiosk --kiosk "http://localhost?local"'
scripts.docker-upload: docker save toomanycaptains/kiosk | gzip | ssh crew@starship 'gunzip | docker load'
scripts.upload: npm run docker-build && npm run docker-upload && npm run docker-run
